comment: Stay away from him if you can.
I thought he was kind of grumpy but the class is super easy as long as you come to class and take notes on what other people read if you dont read it yourself

I dont know how he is during a regular semester, but I took this class during May Session and thoroughly enjoyed him. He is from Nigeria and consequently he does have an accent but its not too hard to understand him. He is easy to talk to and listens to student opinions. Very Good Natured.

He gives multiple novels to read some boring and some interesting, in all there were like nine. only like two of them we did not have to read the whole book. Rarely have test, but when did the test consist of lines from the book and we had to tell who said it, to who, and the context of it. Hard to understand. Class based on discussions and essays.

He's hard but if u put the extra effort u can do good.Gives take home test essays w/ really hard topics.Class presentation,interesting book selection.Hardest thing at 1st was the THICK accent,but u get used 2 it after a while. Seems intimidating at first,but is a nice person in general.Can b hard grader at times-make sure u ALWAYS prove ur point!
